item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

[quote=“CursedChild, post:8, topic:192601”][quote author=Unhandled link=topic=256379.msg2133522#msg2133522 date=1206413671]

I think he wants his private server hosted 24/7, such as a dedi or vps.

Then he can STFU, GTFO, and RTFM. This certainly isn’t the right board to post in.
[/quote]

You are too cool, man… too cool![/quote]
How the hell am I supposed to reply to a compliment? I guess I’ll take it as sarcasm and begin thinking of an intellegent rebuke.
